\renewcommand*\ecvtitle{%taken from definition file ecven.def and adapted to requirement 
    \ecv@utf{\Large\textbf{C\ecv@kern u\ecv@kern r\ecv@kern r\ecv@kern
            i\ecv@kern c\ecv@kern u\ecv@kern l\ecv@kern u\ecv@kern m \ecv@kern V\ecv@kern
            i\ecv@kern t\ecv@kern a\ecv@kern e}}
}
\def\ecv@picture[#1]#2{%
    \def\ecvarg{#2}%
    \ifx\@empty\ecvarg\renewcommand*{\ecvdrawpicture}{}\else%
    \renewcommand*{\ecvdrawpicture}{\begin{picture}(80,0)(0,50)\includegraphics[#1]{#2}\end{picture}}%adjust the (0,50) params to fine tune the picture position
    \fi}%
\makeatother%

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% User specified LaTeX commands.

\ecvpersonalinfo{}{}


\ecvsection{Employment}

\ecvitem[2ex]{May 2017--now}{\textbf{Java Software Engineer} at Six Group.  }

\ecvitem[2ex]{April 2015--April 2017}{\textbf{Back-End Software Engineer} and Cofounder at Taskbase AG. Design, development and maintenance of the Taskbase.com server architecture. Taskbase is a Learning Management System for teachers, teaching assistants and students of various educational institutions in Switzerland. }


\ecvitem[2ex]{October 2012--October 2013}{\textbf{Java and JavaScript Engineer} at ETHJuniors. Extension and maintenance of the store location app of Migros, Switzerland's largest retail company.}


\ecvitem[2ex]{January 2012--June 2012}{\textbf{Assistant at the Insitute for Machine Learning} at ETH as an expert in Robust Principal Component Analysis.}


\ecvitem[2.5ex]{June 2010--August 2010}{\textbf{Software Development Intern} at the start-up Videa - Business Process Optimization.
Java implementation of an interface between two business process modelling
tools.}


\ecvsection{Education}

\ecvitem[2ex]{2014--2016}{\textbf{M.Sc. Computer Science, ETH Zürich} Distributed Computing, Concurrent Computation, Computational Statistics, Projects in Machine Learning, Robotics Programming Lab, Advanced Systems Lab, Algorithms Lab, Web Engineering, Software Engineering, High Tech Start-up Management, ...
Thesis: Combining Paper and Digital Tools in the Classroom: A Case Study}

\ecvitem[2ex]{2008--2013}{\textbf{B.Sc. Computer Science, ETH Zürich} Theory of Computing, Functional Programming, Parallel Programming, Data Modelling and Databases, Distributed Systems, Modelling and Simulation, Pattern Recognition, Visual Computing, Compiler Design, Software Architecture, ...
Thesis: Learning personality preferences for improved dating experiences on a social network}

\ecvitem[2ex]{2001--2007}{\textbf{Gymnasium}, Kantonsschule Obwalden}


\ecvsection{Other}


\ecvitem[2ex]{July 2014}{Deployment of Acadilly.com, a web application for math quizzes
used in two undergraduate Math courses at the University of St. Gallen.}

\ecvitem[2ex]{June 2013}{Deployment of FindMyType.net, a Facebook based recommender
system that was based on an algorithm developed in the context
of my Bachelor Thesis.}

\ecvitem[2ex]{February 2008--July 2008}{Service in the Swiss military as a grenadier.}

\ecvitem[2ex]{August 2007--January 2008}{Construction worker, Schlosserei Andreas Rohrer in Alpnach, Switzerland.}
